info.author: AndrÃ© Roberge
info.description:
Lightning compiler is a mini editor designed for quick testing of Python
scripts. The new version allows dragging-and-dropping of python scripts into the
editor window. A python interpreter is also embedded in the application.
info.name: Lightning-Compiler
info.summary: Mini editor for quick testing of scripts; new: drag and drop option
info.html_description: Lightning compiler is a mini editor designed for quick testing of Python scripts. The new version allows dragging-and-dropping of python scripts into the editor window. A python interpreter is also embedded in the application.
